attributes.comment:
This would not be a positive change for those families who wish to adopt
Internationally as the costs associated with int'l adoption have already increased
by thousands of dollars. The process has become increasingly harder in most
Countries, the fear of the unknown at the beginning of the process is already high
for many couples who are not familiar with the Int'l adoption process and most
importantly, due to the length of time it now takes to adopt,
many families are forced to reapply for approval and/or fingerprints before they
travel to the foreign country to adopt their child. I strongly feel this would have a
negative impact for many couples who want to adopt abroad. Please, do not
make it any harder on us then it already is!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Karen
